Detailed Description

Tools for managing files.

The following example demonstrates how to use this FileUtils class.

 MyPage::onInit(Persistence* const savedInstanceState) {

     // new Content instance
     gaia::core::Context* context =  new gaia::core::Context(this);

     gaia::base::String fileName("file.txt");
     gaia::storage::File* source = new gaia::storage::File(*(context->getCacheDirN()), fileName);
     gaia::storage::File* target = new gaia::storage::File(*(context->getFilesDirN()), fileName);

     // Copy the file in /data/data/PackageName/cache
     // to /data/data/PackageName/files.
     if (source->exists()) {
         gaia::storage::FileUtils::copyToFile(*source, *target);
     }
 }

See the sample given above. It copies the file in /data/data/PackageName/cache to /data/data/PackageName/files.

Read a text file into a String, optionally limiting the length.

Parameters:
fileto read (will not seek, so things like /proc files are OK)
maxlength (positive for head, negative of tail, 0 for no limit)
